post.Title: Unboxing Duke
post.Content:
One does not simply receive a Dukes Choice award - they experience it :-) I've heard in the past from friends who have received the Dukes Choice award in the mail that it is quite a process, so I decided to document the extent of packaging involved in shipping Duke from California to New Zealand...it is, considerable :-)

For those wondering why a Dukes Choice award turned up on my doorstep, I refer you to the announcement that ControlsFX won the award at JavaOne 2017. I am incredibly proud of this project, and as I said then - this is an award for everyone involved.

Here's the unboxing of Duke:

[gallery link="file" ids="http://jonathangiles.net/wp-content/uploads/2017/12/IMG_20171207_150145-1.jpg|Duke arrives in a very big, wooden box,http://jonathangiles.net/wp-content/uploads/2017/12/IMG_20171207_150249-1.jpg|Which contains bubbles and a smaller, cardboard box,http://jonathangiles.net/wp-content/uploads/2017/12/IMG_20171207_150332-3.jpg|The smaller box, extracted out of the larger one,http://jonathangiles.net/wp-content/uploads/2017/12/IMG_20171207_150432-1.jpg|which contains more air bubbles,http://jonathangiles.net/wp-content/uploads/2017/12/IMG_20171207_150455-4.jpg|Underneath the air bubbles, Duke is bubble wrapped,http://jonathangiles.net/wp-content/uploads/2017/12/IMG_20171207_150629-2.jpg|A fair amount of packaging for little old Duke,http://jonathangiles.net/wp-content/uploads/2017/12/IMG_20171207_150742.jpg|Duke surveying his new home,http://jonathangiles.net/wp-content/uploads/2017/12/IMG_20171207_150933.jpg|Pippa gets her turn with Duke,http://jonathangiles.net/wp-content/uploads/2017/12/IMG_20171207_150716.jpg|Henry takes Duke for a tour of the yard,http://jonathangiles.net/wp-content/uploads/2017/12/IMG_20171207_151119-1.jpg|Duke moving in to my office next to my JavaOne Rockstar award"]
